title: Special characters? Are they really allowed?
body:
I just tried to make a new account, so I search "_**ALLOWED**_ special characters in EUNE". I see "Ï‰", copy and paste it into the nickname choosing and "no special characters allowed" pops up. Are the special characters really not allowed?
Oh, and I took the special character from FAQ Riot made. I'd like to notice that it was updated yesterday.

replies.body: Each region has its own set of supported special character, per the guide you mentioned.  The characters haven't been updated with new ones as far as I'm aware, though.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our account team can check to see if they can make this available for you manually.
